edge_1: Rocket and Groot are a pair of bounty hunters who help Peter Quill and his group escape from prison in Kyln.
edge_2: Groot sacrifices himself to shield the group.
Ronan threatens to kill Thanos after first destroying Xandar.
Ronan uses his empowered warhammer to destroy the Nova Corps fleet.
Drax and Rocket destroy Ronan's warhammer.
